body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.0 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Beginnings of a user interface for the builtin Internet Explorer.
Support for cross-process OLE drag & drop.
New builtin wscript.exe (Windows Script Host) program.
Open/save dialogs remember the last used directory.
Translation updates.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
